original_text: So I will go to my father and tell him, ‘I have done bad things against God, and I have done bad things against you.
korean_text: 내가 일어나 아버지께 가서 이르기를 아버지 내가 하늘과 아버지께 죄를 지었사오니

sentences.original_text: So I will go to my father
I have done bad things against God
and I have done bad things against you
